name: Skeleton Sprint
description: Use interesting puzzle mechanics like the burrow power-up on challenging puzzles that increase in difficulty and complexity as you play through the game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Something made in the last 10 years Graphics: Integrated graphics Storage: 600 MB available space Sound Card: Required to hear music Additional Notes: I'm not being paid enough to get legit specs
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10 Processor: Intel I9-7900x Memory: 10000000000000000000 GB RAM Graphics: Quadro P6000 Storage: 9001 GB available space Sound Card: Required to hear music Additional Notes: *Slightly overkill
